# Test Streamlit Dashboard

Invoke the test-streamlit-dashboard agent for automated testing of Streamlit dashboards using Playwright with issue tracking and reporting.

## Inputs

* ${input:appPath}: (Required) Path to the Streamlit application to test.
* ${input:testScope}: (Optional) Test scope:
  * smoke - Quick startup and navigation verification
  * functional - Interactive widget and data flow testing
  * visual - Layout and rendering validation
  * full - Complete test suite across all dimensions

---

Invoke test-streamlit-dashboard mode and proceed with the user's request.
